BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS_LOG(STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,STR_APRIL,STR_MAY,STR_JUNE,STR_JULY,STR_AUGUST,STR_SEPTEMBER,STR_OCTOBER,STR_NOVEMBER, STR_DECEMBER, STR_JANUARY,STR_FEBRUARY,STR_MARCH,STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_SLNO,GNUM_ISVALID,STR_LIC_POLICY_NO,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) SELECT STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,STR_APRIL,STR_MAY,STR_JUNE,STR_JULY,STR_AUGUST,STR_SEPTEMBER,STR_OCTOBER,STR_NOVEMBER, STR_DECEMBER, STR_JANUARY,STR_FEBRUARY,STR_MARCH,STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,?,?,GSTR_REMARKS,?,GNUM_ISVALID,STR_LIC_POLICY_NO,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE FROM ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? and STR_LIC_POLICY_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS SET STR_APRIL=?,STR_MAY=?,STR_JUNE=?,STR_JULY=?,STR_AUGUST=?,STR_SEPTEMBER=?,STR_OCTOBER=?,STR_NOVEMBER=?,STR_DECEMBER=?,STR_JANUARY=?,STR_FEBRUARY=?,STR_MARCH=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_SLNO=? WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and STR_LIC_POLICY_NO=? AND STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=?

INSERT INTO ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS_LOG(STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,STR_APRIL,STR_MAY,STR_JUNE,STR_JULY,STR_AUGUST,STR_SEPTEMBER,STR_OCTOBER,STR_NOVEMBER, STR_DECEMBER, STR_JANUARY,STR_FEBRUARY,STR_MARCH,STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_SLNO,GNUM_ISVALID,STR_LIC_POLICY_NO,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) SELECT STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,STR_APRIL,STR_MAY,STR_JUNE,STR_JULY,STR_AUGUST,STR_SEPTEMBER,STR_OCTOBER,STR_NOVEMBER, STR_DECEMBER, STR_JANUARY,STR_FEBRUARY,STR_MARCH,STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,?,?,GSTR_REMARKS,?,'0',STR_LIC_POLICY_NO,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE FROM ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS WHERE GNUM_ISVALID=1 AND STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? and STR_LIC_POLICY_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE ACTPAY_LIC_DEDUCTION_TRNS T WHERE STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? and STR_LIC_POLICY_NO=? and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
